items.sentence: Everybody falls in love at least once in their lives.
Everybody knew there was something terrible going on.
Everyone is drinking, and nearly everyone is smoking.
French is the only foreign language that I can speak.
Tom came down with a cold and couldn\'t go to school.
Tom can\'t do his job without an internet connection.
Tom dove into the water and swam as fast as he could.
What\'s the nationality of that cameraman over there?
I don\'t want to eat Chinese food for dinner tonight.
It\'s no use pretending that you can\'t speak French.
